meals.name: Yogurt Parfait
meals.cooking_instructions:
Add yogurt to a bowl
Layer with strawberries
Top with granola

meals.name: Protein Pancakes
meals.cooking_instructions:
Mix all ingredients
Heat a pan
Pour batter and cook until golden

meals.name: Berry Smoothie
meals.cooking_instructions:
Add all ingredients to a blender
Blend until smooth
Serve cold

meals.name: Overnight Oats
meals.cooking_instructions:
Mix all ingredients
Store in a jar
Refrigerate overnight

meals.name: Smoothie Bowl
meals.cooking_instructions:
Blend all ingredients
Pour into a bowl
Add toppings if desired

meals.name: Chicken Salad
meals.cooking_instructions:
Chop chicken
Mix with lettuce
Top with salsa

meals.name: Tuna Toast
meals.cooking_instructions:
Toast the bread
Spread tuna on top
Add a layer of lettuce

meals.name: Mango Yoghurt
meals.cooking_instructions:
Peel and dice mango
Mix with yogurt
Top with granola

meals.name: Protein Waffles
meals.cooking_instructions:
Mix ingredients
Pour into waffle maker
Cook until crisp

meals.name: Pasta Bolognese
meals.cooking_instructions:
Cook pasta
Brown beef
Stir in tomato paste
Combine with pasta

meals.name: Chicken Wrap
meals.cooking_instructions:
Season and grill chicken
Add to tortilla and add lettuce

meals.name: Pear Yoghurt
meals.cooking_instructions:
Dice pear
Mix with yogurt
Sprinkle granola on top

meals.name: Banana Smoothie
meals.cooking_instructions:
Add all ingredients to blender
Blend until smooth

meals.name: Protein Bar
meals.cooking_instructions:
Mix ingredients
Shape into bars
Chill in fridge

meals.name: Cottage Cheese Bowl
meals.cooking_instructions:
Add cottage cheese to bowl
Top with berries and oats

meals.name: Turkey Rice Cakes
meals.cooking_instructions:
Slice cucumber
Layer turkey and cucumber on rice cakes

meals.name: Mexican Bowl
meals.cooking_instructions:
Layer rice in bowl
Add chicken, beans, and guacamole

meals.name: Poke Bowl
meals.cooking_instructions:
Cook rice
Dice salmon, cucumber, and avocado
Arrange in bowl

meals.name: Pizza
meals.cooking_instructions:
Spread sauce on tortilla
Add toppings
Bake until crisp

meals.name: Chicken & Rice
meals.cooking_instructions:
Cook chicken
Prepare cauliflower rice
Serve with rice cakes and olive oil

meals.name: Berries Yogurt
meals.cooking_instructions:
Combine yogurt and berries
Add granola on top

meals.name: Strawberry Shake
meals.cooking_instructions:
Mix all ingredients
Stir until doughy
Chill before eating

meals.name: Peanut Butter Shake
meals.cooking_instructions:
Add all ingredients to blender
Blend until smooth

meals.name: Berry Ice Cream
meals.cooking_instructions:
Freeze strawberries
Blend with milk and protein powder until creamy

meals.name: Mug Cake
meals.cooking_instructions:
Mix all in a mug
Microwave for 1-2 minutes
Let cool slightly
